name: RSS feed to Twitter or other social

parameters.name: continueWhenNoRes
parameters.label: Continue the execution of the route even if the module returns no results

expect.help: Enter a URL that points to a valid RSS or Atom export.
expect.name: url
expect.label: URL

expect.help: Enter a date in the 'date from' field from which you want to filter RSS feed items. Make will process all items that are more recent than the specified date.
expect.name: filterDateFrom
expect.label: Date from

expect.help: Enter a date in the 'date to' field from which you want to filter RSS feed items. Make will process all items dated on or before the specified date.
expect.name: filterDateTo
expect.label: Date to

expect.help: Adds an `Accept-Encoding` header to request compressed content.
expect.name: gzip
expect.label: Request compressed content

expect.name: channelWType
expect.label: Enter a channel ID or name

expect.name: for_super_followers_only
expect.label: Allow to Post Exclusively for Super Followers Only

expect.name: channelWType
expect.label: Enter a channel ID or name
